text: Rarely do great beauty and great virtue dwell together.
author: Petrarch

text: I didn't have any confidence in my beauty when I was young. I felt like a character actress, and I still do.
author: Meryl Streep

text: I really admire a woman for her intelligence, her personality. Beauty is not enough.
author: Roberto Cavalli

text: I write for no other purpose than to add to the beauty that now belongs to me. I write a book for no other reason than to add three or four hundred acres to my magnificent estate.
author: Jack London

text: They saw me, those reckless seekers of beauty, and in a night I was famous.
author: Lillie Langtry
